website_summaries.verdict: Strong, natural essential oils are blended directly into the collar's material, so it diffuses for a longer period of time.
pros: Provides up to four months of protection
Protects with a blend of oils - no harsh chemicals included
Helps repel fleas, ticks, lice, and pests
Oils are blended into dog's collar so they can diffuse over time
cons: Lasts for a shorter time period than other options
Some find the collar's scent to be overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for a flea collar I was excited to find an all natural one with good reviews. Do not buy it! My cat wore this collar for three days and had all of the fur on her neck fall off. I am currently having to treat her wounds from this collar! Worst of all as im taking the collar off a flea crawled across it... obviously it wasn’t even doing what it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat who is allergic to mosquitoes. They would constantly bite him on the nose and ears. His face would get raw after a while so we had to start keeping him in the house. I thought I would try this collar to see how it would do. This thing works great. He has had it on now about two weeks and has 0 bites showing where before he would always get e couple. Going to buy some more of these for when this one quits working.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Try
customer_reviews.text: I've lived in the same location for over 30 years. This is only the 2nd year I remember even having mosquitos and I think these are on steroids! Our "mosquito control district" has been actively spraying with limited results. This collar works as well or slightly better than some of the herbal sprays. Cat isn't found of being sprayed, so the collar is better in that respect It isn't 100% but does have some positive effect. It's not a break away collar, so I am limited to supervised usage only with my cat.
customer_reviews.author: PeterG

customer_reviews.title: effective, natural flea and tick repellent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. It works and is effective. I found that the flea drops from another brand were causing seizures to my little dog. I found this product and feel good that I have a natural repellent that does the job and doesn't hurt my pet in the meantime. The cat collar does the same, works, smells pleasant and lasts the 3 months I use mine.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: flea collar Works!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat and I love this product! The collar fits well, no fleas any more! I could not afford the $50+ collar the vet recommended and saw yours at a price I could afford. I trust your products as I used your protein powder in my own diet for several years with positive results. Thank you for a natural alternative for my fella!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old cat has never had a collar, but he is totally unbothered by the Herbal Repellant Collar. He is an indoor cat totally, but somehow still picked up some fleas. I tried the toxic ointments you put between the cat's shoulder blades, but it just made him sick for days and seemed to have no effect on the fleas. This collar smells quite pleasant, has not bothered him at all and I see no fleas. I am delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this but unfortunately it didn't do the job and I had to buy spot on treatment to eliminate flees. I can't say positively but I don't think my cat had flees when I first put it on. So not only did it not get rid of flees but it didn't prevent her from getting flees. Only giving two stars because it's not filled with toxins. I will say that my cat spends about 95% of her time outdoors and we live in the country surrounded by deer that are most likely flee infested. May be more effective for a mostly indoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: kmfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes. I have been a fan of Dr. Mercola for years. However I can’t say that this collar was effective. I put it in my cat and watched fleas crawl across the collar, completely unbothered. The smell of the collar was extremely strong. It made my kitty sneeze a lot. I wouldn’t recommend this for an outdoor cat or one with a sensitive nose.
customer_reviews.author: eyeread

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. It broke right off the box as soon as I tried to put it on my cat's neck. Very flimsy. Love the aroma of it, so minty and smells so natural. It is just not made of strong material. What a shame. I really wanted it to work. Could it be that it was factory defective? Not sure I would want to spend non-refundable $11 + tax again to give it a second chance. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ive Ammoune

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell of this collar (cloves) which is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do not think this does anything to repel fleas because I have caught fleas on this collar. I like the smell of this collar (cloves) which is the only reason I keep the collar on, but as soon as my new flea collar comes in I will probably get rid of this one.
customer_reviews.author: dalko

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Changed to these collars from another herbal brand. Almost immediately, we had a flea problem. Useless, as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Liane Varnes

customer_reviews.title: Get one for my cat before the start of mosquito ...
customer_reviews.text: Get one for my cat before the start of mosquito season since he has an outdoor space he likes to sleep in. Definitely helps with the bites he gets on his face, not 100 % but a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for an outdoor cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is an indoor/outdoor cat. It lasted for a few days, maybe because my cat spends most of her time outside. I think this product may work best for an indoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Dill

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: This collar is really strong smelling, but it works. My cat is allergic to mosquito bites, and her little nose swells and bleeds. This collar stops the pain and heartache. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Karen krbechek

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Did not work at all! Cat was still coming in with fleas and ticks on him. Plus it made his hair fall out where the collar had been! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michael

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: Broke as soon as I tried to put it on my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reeks
customer_reviews.text: This collar reeks. It has a disturbing odor. I have a completely indoor cat and thought a neighbors new dog was the culprit. I wouldn’t subject my animal to this odor. Even after repacking it and cleaning the area where it was, the smell lingers. If you breathe, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne C Burger

customer_reviews.title: Mercola is a quack that sells lots of snake oil.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this product unaware that Mercola is an utter quack. It might have had a mild effect the first day or so, but basically a worthless product. Do not buy unless you just love throwing money away.
customer_reviews.author: Cryptohominid

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Smells nice too. My cat smells like a box of gum haha
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It won't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: My cat was able to get this collar off easily. I don't know if it works or not, because he consistently removes it.
customer_reviews.author: Cockatiels R Us

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad to say that I'm not sure this really repels any pests. My cat still has fleas. She smells nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Raven

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: Smell over powering my cat was nauseous and actually thew-up. I could not get it undone had to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all, it really seemed to attract more fleas around her neck. It was really disappointing. Waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: ChriscoNabisco

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Never got to see if it works because the buckle portion broke off as I unravelled it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatanta

customer_reviews.title: all is good!
customer_reviews.text: It's worked well but doesn't really mosquitos from my cats ears. Apart from that, all is good!
customer_reviews.author: L GARMORY

customer_reviews.title: Horrible odor. Did not repel fleas
customer_reviews.text: Smelled horrible. Returned product. Only to be charged again!!!! Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Steele

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Had used another brand before earlier and it had worked amazing. But this collar isn't making any difference and we've been using for more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Haleema Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Very strong odor, which gave us a headache, ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong odor, which gave us a headache, so we couldn't leave on the cat very long. Letting it air for awhile outside and may try again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product. The smell is not offensive and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. The smell is not offensive and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Chazy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best collars - every cat owner should be using - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mulberrycountry

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 4 months ago and still seems to be working for her. Wish their price didn’t go up though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but didn't last very long, maybe three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works to keep bugs away from my kitty who likes to sit in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my cat, mosquitoes stay away from him!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: buckle portion fell apart and was unable to apply to cat
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wohlgemuth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The flees jump off on me. Still see eggs on my cat. u
customer_reviews.author: Susan Portuges

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE AND EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: THIS DID NOT TAKE OUT A SINGLE FLEA, HOWEVER it was an unusually long and warm season in Seattle and they are hardy and out in full force. I had to get a prescription from the vet to get rid of the fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Black

customer_reviews.title: Needed a safe preventative
customer_reviews.text: My cat is an indoor cat that goes out occasionally. He was getting bitten by some insect and I suspect they were red bugs or chiggers. He is on a flea and tick preventative but I needed something extra so I bought this collar. It worked well. No more bites. It is also easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Braums

customer_reviews.title: Really strong smell
customer_reviews.text: My cat seemed so upset by the strong smell there was no way I was going to make him endure wearing this collar. I'm going to try again tomorrow- I'm hoping it will be a little less pungent then. For now it seems like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Gross

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed by this product. It broke while I was trying to open it up. I would not recommend for outdoor cats since it was so fragile.
customer_reviews.author: susan payne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works, I watched Mosquitos fly away from the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Marglow

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Is not effective in repelling fleas present on the animal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hughes-Jelen

customer_reviews.title: ... seen one mosquito and let me tell you I love in mosquito heaven so I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Since I put it on the outside cat I have not seen one mosquito and let me tell you I love in mosquito heaven so I would recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inert ingredient caution
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface by saying that I am a believer in and myself use therapeutic grade essential oils. However, wintergreen oil is the main inert ingredient (representing 99.1% and are not listed in the production description). The scent is so strong as to be repugnant & overpowering. We are respectfully not asking our cat to tolerate this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Springer

product_meta.title: Dr. Mercola Herbal Repellent Collar for Cats & Kittens
